effects.name: Ajax Turns
effects.effect: Ajax takes up to three turns each round. He can't take turns consecutively. Additionally, he can use three triggered actions in a round while he isn't dazed.

effects.name: End Effect
effects.effect: At the end of each of his turns, Ajax can take 20 damage to end up to two effects on him that can be ended by a saving throw. This damage can't be reduced in any way.

effects.tier1: 16 damage; M<4 the target loses 1d3 Recoveries
effects.tier2: 22 damage; M<5 the target loses 1d3 Recoveries
effects.tier3: 26 damage; M<6 prone and the target loses 1d3 Recoveries

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Ajax shifts up to 2 squares between striking each target.
Ajax can strike one additional target for each Malice spent.

items.name: Decree by the Jade Hand
items.target: Each enemy and object in the area

effects.tier1: 11 holy damage; slide 2; P<4 the target is hexed (save ends)
effects.tier2: 17 holy damage; slide 5; P<5 the target is hexed (save ends)
effects.tier3: 21 holy damage; slide 8; P<6 the target is hexed (save ends)

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: A hexed target glows green, and each of their heroic abilities has its cost increased by 2.
The potency increases by 1. Additionally, the ground beneath the area drops 3 squares and is difficult terrain. Each flying target who has M<5 is knocked prone.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: If the target is grabbed, Ajax can choose to keep the vine extended, pull the target adjacent to him, or pull himself adjacent to the target. The vine stays attached to a grabbed target until it takes damage from a strike, the target escapes the grab, or Ajax causes the vine to release the target (no action required).

effects.name: Special
effects.effect: This ability can be replaced with the features of a different treasure Ajax has acquired.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Ajax throws a glowing bead to a square within distance, which ignites at the start of Ajax's next turn and creates an area around it that lasts until the start of Ajax's following turn. Each enemy in the area when the bead ignites takes 20 fire damage, and if they have A<5, they are dazed (save ends). Any enemy who starts their turn in the area takes 10 fire damage.

Ajax dies only when his Stamina reaches âˆ’350. While his Stamina is below 0, Ajax is bleeding, he can choose any two options from his Tactical Stance trait each round, and the Director gains 2 additional Malice per round.

items.name: Is This What They Taught You?
items.trigger: A creature within distance marks Ajax.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The target is marked while Ajax is marked. While the target is marked this way, Ajax gains an edge on power rolls against them, and whenever the target uses a triggered action involving their mark on Ajax, he can make a free strike against them.

items.name: Shieldbreaker Talisman
items.trigger: An enemy within distance uses an ability to reduce damage.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Ajax makes a free strike against the target, dealing extra damage equal to twice the amount that was reduced. This extra damage can't be reduced in any way.

items.name: Who's Hesitating?
items.trigger: A creature uses the Hesitation is Weakness ability.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Ajax shifts up to his speed and can make a free strike. If the target has R<4, this free strike also makes them weakened until the end of their next turn.

items.name: Your Obsession With Me Betrays You
items.trigger: Ajax causes a creature within distance to gain ferocity or wrath.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: If the target has I<4, they use a signature ability against a target of Ajax's choice.

items.name: You Would Flounder Your Assault?
items.trigger: A creature within 10 squares regains Stamina.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Ajax regains the same amount of Stamina.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Ajax flies at high speed to cut through each target, then appears in an unoccupied space within distance.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Ajax uses the shadow elf eclipse's technique to reduce each target's surges to 0. Additionally, until the end of the round, Ajax ignores edges and double edges on any target's abilities, and ignores any nondamaging effects of any target's damage-dealing abilities.

effects.name: Special
effects.effect: This villain action can be replaced with a villain action from a creature any target has previously encountered.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each target who has I<5 is knocked prone and can't stand until Ajax deals damage to them. For each target not knocked prone, Ajax can move up to his speed toward that target and use Blade of the Gol King against them.
